__TOC__

This Interlock schedule contains an overview of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QuantalQuetzal/ReleaseSchedule|current development release]]</nowiki> as well as <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PrecisePangolin/ReleaseSchedule|12.04.1 plans]]</nowiki>.

* Freezes normally happen at 2100 UTC, to permit overnight builds to include the last content.  Please make sure all changes have been uploaded before then unless agreed to by the release manager.
* Also,  see the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OtherProjectSchedules|schedules of other projects]]</nowiki>
* Legend: 
** H,L,N,O,P,Q - active releases  ( * denotes all stable active)
** -D - testing based on daily image
** -A#, -B# - testing for a milestone release
** -SRU - stable release update kernel testing
** -V - validation testing for a release
** -P - testing from -proposed
** -QK - testing quantal kernel in other release context (P-QK)
